items.title: This stock from the CNBC Stock Draft is forming a ‘cup-and-handle’ chart pattern, says Simple Trading’s Danielle Shay
items.description: Now is the time to get bullish on Costco, according to Danielle Shay, vice president of options at Simpler Trading.

items.title: Goldman estimates foreign investors were selling U.S. stocks big, but isn't worried
items.description: The firm predicts international traders dumped more than $60 billion of U.S. equities in net between March and April.

items.title: Bank of America likes these high-quality financial stocks — and they pay a dividend
items.description: These five financial stocks pay solid dividends and are on Bank of America's buy list.

items.title: Is the market's rebound for real? This sector ETF may be the tell
items.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the action in the Communications Services Select SPDR.

items.title: This fintech stock is attractively valued and can rally nearly 40%, Citizens says
items.description: "SoFi is at an inflection point, with substantial earnings potential that we believe the market is currently undervaluing," the firm said.
